verses.roman:
saṅkarṣaṇa-avatāra kāraṇābdhi-śāyī
tāṅhāra hṛdaye bhakta-bhāva anuyāyī

synonyms: saṅkarṣaṇa-avatāra-an incarnation of Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa; kāraṇa-abdhi-śāyī-Lord Viṣṇu lying on the Causal Ocean; tāṅhāra-His; hṛdaye-in the heart; bhakta-bhāva-the emotion of being a devotee; anuyāyī-accordingly.
translation: The Viṣṇu who lies on the Causal Ocean is an incarnation of Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa, and, accordingly, the emotion of being a devotee is always present in His heart.
